description:
Muka Muka Chori arrives at the Screw-Ya with a request: help her track down a hot guy she met on Fretter! She doesn`t know anything about his real life identity, though, so to track him down, they need the aid of Hacker Rat. Hacker Rat guides them into cyberspace to help them track down her man, but will they make it out alive?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dennou Nezumi wa Bokyabot no Dame o Miruka
Do Cyber-Rats Dream of Loser Vocabots?
電脳鼠はボキャボットのダメを見るか
